parameters.name: visionBasic
parameters.label: Vision Radius of Basic Boids
parameters.description: Perception radius for basic boids. 0 - no perception, 100 - global perception

parameters.name: visionPredator
parameters.label: Vision Radius of Predator Boids
parameters.description: Perception radius for predator boids. 0 - no perception, 100 - global perception

parameters.name: alignmentBasic
parameters.label: Alignment Weight for Basic Boids
parameters.description: Velocity matching with neighbors. 0 - no alignment, 100 - full alignment

parameters.name: cohesionBasic
parameters.label: Cohesion Weight for Basic Boids
parameters.description: Attraction to neighbors' center of mass. 0 - no cohesion, 100 - full cohesion

parameters.name: separationBasic
parameters.label: Separation Weight for Basic Boids
parameters.description: Repulsion from neighbors. 0 - no separation, 100 - full separation

parameters.name: cruisingSpeedBasic
parameters.label: Cruising Speed for Basic Boids
parameters.description: Preferred cruising speed for basic boids. 0 - no movement, 100 - maximum available speed (200 units/s)

parameters.name: maxSpeedBasic
parameters.label: Max Speed for Basic Boids
parameters.description: Maximum speed for basic boids. 0 - no movement, 100 - maximum available speed (200 units/s)

parameters.name: minSpeedBasic
parameters.label: Min Speed for Basic Boids
parameters.description: Minimum speed for basic boids.

parameters.name: cruisingSpeedPredator
parameters.label: Cruising Speed for Predator Boids
parameters.description: Preferred cruising speed for predator boids. 0 - no movement, 100 - maximum available speed (200 units/s)

parameters.name: maxSpeedPredator
parameters.label: Max Speed for Predator Boids
parameters.description: Maximum speed for predator boids. 0 - no movement, 100 - maximum available speed (200 units/s)

parameters.name: minSpeedPredator
parameters.label: Min Speed for Predator Boids
parameters.description: Minimum speed for predator boids.

parameters.name: maxForce
parameters.label: Max Force
parameters.description: Maximum steering force applied to boids. 0 - no steering, 100 - maximum steering

parameters.name: drag
parameters.label: Drag
parameters.description: Velocity damping factor. 0 - no drag, 100 - no movement

parameters.name: noise
parameters.label: Noise
parameters.description: Random velocity rotation strength.

parameters.name: accuracy
parameters.label: Neighbor Accuracy
parameters.description: Maximum percentage of neighbors considered when calculating boid behavior. 100 - all boids, 0 - no boids

parameters.name: bounce
parameters.label: Bounce Walls
parameters.description: Bounce at world bounds (false = wrap)

parameters.name: targetAttractionBasic
parameters.label: Target Attraction Weight for Basic Boids
parameters.description: Attraction weight to the local target for basic boids. 0 - no attraction, 100 - full attraction

parameters.name: bounceFactor
parameters.label: Bounce Factor
parameters.description: Velocity reduction factor upon obstacle collision. 0 - full stop, 100 - no reduction

parameters.name: mouseInteractionMultiplier
parameters.label: Mouse Interaction Multiplier
parameters.description: Multiplier for forces applied by mouse interaction.

parameters.name: numberOfStepsToStopWhenFullDrag
parameters.label: Number of Steps to Stop When Full Drag
parameters.description: Number of simulation steps required for a boid to come to a complete stop when drag is at maximum (100).
